resume.name: Nanzheng Xie
resume.title: Applied AI Engineer (CISSP, CRISC)
resume.profile: Applied Al engineer (CISSP, CRISC) with 6+ years' experience leading cross-functional teams to deliver Al- and security-driven products. I led product strategy, delivered digital-transformation outcomes, and strengthened risk-aware decision-making across internal teams and global stakeholders.

job.title: Senior Consultant – Al & Cybersecurity
job.description: Built and productionized large-scale Insider-Threat ML platform, developed a “Phishing Response Plugin”, and built an executive-facing Water Sector Readiness Dashboard. Led the design of Security Operations Centre tech stack.

job.title: Cybersecurity Consultant
job.description: Contributed as an industry stakeholder in developing research methodologies to integrate cybersecurity into engineering practices for Critical Infrastructure. Delivered training on the CIE framework.

job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Developed In-house algorithm using RFC and Time Series Modeling in production PLCs, resulting in annual savings of $750,000 in Wastewater Critical Infrastructure.

job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Development of intelligent cabin filter, utilizing RGB light sensors to predict filter condition (aging) using machine learning.

job.title: Quantitative Risk Analyst
job.description: Conducted financial risk analysis of downtime. Analyse and provided strategy guidance to reduce risk impact and asset re-balancing in two largest NIKE manufacturing plants.

school.degree: Master of Information Management and Systems
